domo.educational.io

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • domo.educational.io.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Stefano Falzaresi Stefano.Falzaresi2@studio.unibo.it This is a room, is made by a name and a list of sensor, all the methods where the room name can be changed are surrounded by "try - catch" clause because the method "checkName" can throw a Custom Exception and interrupt the execution of the program, we will the difference between Flat and Room in the Test Class
